title: Perlin Walks
description: Colorful circles gain life with the aid of Perlin noise.

title: Incoming
description: NASA Asteroid data + Recent earth imagery + Asteroids exploding into multicolored particles.

title: Little Islands
description: Small changes often unexpectedly affect the ways we are connected. This is a craft involving patterns and rotating tiles.

title: Triangles
description: More experimentation with patterns and rotating tiles, this time using sharper objects.

title: Labyrinth
description: Truchet tiling one last time. Playing with sharp turns and dead ends lead to random labyrinths.
